    The 'compnet' workflow

    Compute summary statistics quantifying row/column-level and third order dependencies in a symmetric matrix with NA diagonals

    compute_gofstats.Rd

    Compute summary statistics quantifying row/column-level and third order dependencies in a symmetric matrix with NA diagonals

    Usage

    compute_gofstats(Y)

    Arguments

    Y

    A symmetric matrix with NA diagonals

    Value

    A named vector containing: 1- the standard deviation of row means, and 2- The triadic dependency metric used by Hoff, Fosdick, & Volfovsky's "amen" package.

    Examples

    
data(ex_presabs)
data(ex_traits)

# Quick demo run. Will prompt warnings.
# Run with default warmup and iter for good posterior sampling.
ex_compnet <- buildcompnet(presabs=ex_presabs, spvars_dist_int=ex_traits, warmup=10, iter=20)
#>

ex_compnet_summ
#>                      Mean       2.5%      97.5%
